fieldGroup.template: Are data of a personal nature used in this activity?
Personal data are any numerical, text, graphic, photographic, audio or any other kind of information about the possible participants.

HELP: EU Regulation 679/2016 and the personal data protection and guarantee of digital rights act, Organic Law 3/2018, oblige the UPV/EHU to record data processing. Any request for the record of data processing should be addressed to the data protection officer (dpd@ehu.eus). Full details of data protection can be found on the website: Babestu - Data Protection - General Secretariat - UPV/EHU.
